requirements.summary: Create customer management module UI with CRUD operations for Indonesian business data

Create customer form component with fields for company name, NPWP (with Indonesian format validation), address, contact person, phone, email, credit limit. Include Indonesian validation messages. Call backend addCustomer/updateCustomer methods.
Create React Query hooks for customer CRUD operations: useGetCustomers, useGetCustomer, useAddCustomer, useUpdateCustomer, useDeleteCustomer. Use backend methods from backend interface.

requirements.summary: Create rental order management UI with lifecycle tracking

Delivery and pickup scheduling with date/time tracking

Create React Query hooks for rental order operations: useGetAllOrders, useGetOrder, useCreateOrder, useUpdateOrder, useDeleteOrder. Use backend methods from backend interface.

requirements.summary: Create pricing and quotation system UI

Automatic quotation generation based on requested items and duration

Create quotation generator component with item selection, duration input, automatic total calculation with rate card and volume discount application. Show quotation preview with version tracking. Include approval workflow UI. Indonesian labels and formatting.
Create React Query hooks for pricing operations: useGetRateCards, useUpdateRateCard, useGenerateQuotation, useApproveQuotation. Connect to backend capabilities for pricing and quotation management.

requirements.summary: Create invoicing system UI with payment tracking

Create invoice form component showing rental order details, line items, rates, subtotal, tax calculations, total. Include print-friendly layout. Indonesian labels and number formatting.

Create React Query hooks for invoice operations: useGetInvoices, useGetInvoice, useRecordPayment, useGetOverdueInvoices, useGetAgingReport. Connect to backend invoice and payment tracking capabilities.

requirements.summary: Create Indonesian tax compliance UI module
acceptanceCriteria: Automatic PPN calculation at 11% on all rental invoices

Monthly PPN summary report (SPT Masa PPN)

Create React Query hooks for tax operations: useGetTaxInvoices, useGenerateTaxInvoice, useGetPPNSummary, useExportEFakturData. Connect to backend tax calculation and reporting capabilities.
